h4.p: [21] ``dasakkhattuṃ satakkhattuṃ, dasasatakkhattuṃ satānañca satakkhattuṃ {satāni ca sattakkhattuṃ (sī0 ka0)}.
[22] devesu upapajjimha, ko vādo mānuse bhave..
[22] sattaratanamahesī {sattaratanassa mahesī (sī0 pī0)}, itthiratanaṃ ahaṃ bhaviṃ..
[22] dhanañjānī ca khemā ca, ahampi ca tayo janā..
[22] devesu aggataṃ pattā, manussesu tatheva ca..
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo..
[22] datvā dānāni sakkaccaṃ, agāreva vataṃ {agāreva vattaṃ (syā0)} cariṃ..
[21] ``so hetu ca so pabhavo, tammūlaṃ sāsane khamaṃ {tammūlaṃ sā ca sāsane khanti (sī0 pī0 ka0)}.
[22] paṭhamaṃ taṃ samodhānaṃ, taṃ dhammaratāya nibbānaṃ {nibbutaṃ (syā0)}..
[21] ``svāgataṃ ^a^T2.0256^ea^ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa {buddhaseṭṭhassa (sī0 syā0 ka0)} santike.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ sumedhā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``svāgataṃ ^a^P2.0514^ea^ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ ^a^T2.0257^ea^ sudaṃ mekhalādāyikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] dhuvaṃ ticīvaraṃdāsiṃ {thūpañca pavaramadaṃ (syā0), dhuvañca cīvaraṃ adaṃ (pī0)}, buddhassa lokabandhuno..
[21] ``svāgataṃ ^a^M2.0190^ea^ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ maṇḍapadāyikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] anukampako lokanātho, sirasi {sīsante (sī0 ka0)} akkamī mama {tadā (syā0 pī0)}..
[21] ``svāgataṃ ^a^P2.0515^ea^ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ saṅkamanatthā {saṅkamanadā (syā0)} bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] saṃvejetvāna me cittaṃ {vedayitvāna kusalaṃ (syā0), saṃvedayitvā kusalaṃ (pī0)}, pabbajiṃ anagāriyaṃ..
[21] ``kilesā jhāpitā mayhaṃ, bhavā sabbe samūhatā {bhavā saṃghātitā mama (ka0)}.
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ naḷamālikā therī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] tassa rañño ahuṃ bhariyā, ekajjhaṃ cārayāmahaṃ {ekaccaṃ vādayāmahaṃ (syā0)}..
[22] nirayaṃ nūna gacchāmi, ettha me natthi saṃsayo'..
[22] manasā patthitaṃ mayhaṃ, nibbattati yathicchitaṃ {yaticchakaṃ (syā0), yadicchakaṃ (pī0 ka0)}..
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ ekapiṇḍapātadāyikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] vīthiyā saṇṭhito satthā, akā me anumodanaṃ..
[21] ``sudinnaṃ me dānavaraṃ {sudinnameva me dānaṃ (syā0)}, suyiṭṭhā yāgasampadā.
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ kaṭacchubhikkhādāyikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``nagare ^a^V2.0186^ea^ aruṇavatiyā, aruṇo nāma {aruṇavā nāma (sī0 pī0)} ttiyo.
[22] tassa rañño ahuṃ bhariyā, vāritaṃ vārayāmahaṃ {cārikaṃ cārayāmahaṃ (sī0), na gulaṃ pādayāmahaṃ (syā0), na mālaṃ pādayāmahaṃ (pī0)}..
[22] chadiṃ karonto buddhassa, matthake dhārayanti te..
[22] dubbaṇṇiyaṃ na jānāmi {duggatiṃ nābhijānāmi (syā0 pī0)}, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ..
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ sattuppalamālikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] dassetu pāṭihīraṃ me, bodhi obhāsatu ayaṃ'..
[22] yāva udeti sūriyo, dīpā me pajjaluṃ tadā..
[21] ``parammukhā ^a^P2.0520^ea^ nisīditvā {puratthābhimukhā santi (syā0), puratthābhimukhā thitā (pī0)}, yadi icchāmi passituṃ.
[22] uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, sabbaṃ passāmi cakkhunā..
[22] tattha āvaraṇaṃ natthi, rukkhesu pabbatesu vā..
[22] mātukucchigatā santī {mātukucchigataṃ santiṃ (sī0)}, akkhi me na nimīlati..
[22] suññāgāre ^a^T2.0267^ea^ vasantiyā {ca jhāyante (sī0), ca jhāyantā (pī0), pajjhāyantā (syā0)}, pañcadīpā jalanti me..
[22] pañcadīpā mahāvīra, pāde vandāmi {vandati (sī0 ka0)} cakkhuma..
[21] ``svāgataṃ ^a^P2.0521^ea^ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ pañcadīpikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] tattha me sukataṃ byamhaṃ, udahārena nimmitaṃ..
[22] dasaṭṭhānehi tā sabbā, abhibhomi sadā ahaṃ..
[21] ``avuṭṭhikā disā natthi, santattā kuthitāpi {santattā kuthitā na ca (sī0 pī0), santattā khuppitā hi me (syā0)} ca.
[21] ``uṇhaṃ vā pariḷāho vā, sarīre me na vijjati.
[22] kāye ca me rajo natthi, dakadānassidaṃ phalaṃ..
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ udakadāyikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[21] dīpadā dakadā ceva, gāthāyo gaṇitā iha.
[22] ekagāthāsatañceva, tiṃsati ca taduttari {sattarasaṃ taduttari (syā0), sattādasa taduttariṃ (pī0)}..
[22] disvā sarājakaṃ senaṃ, evāhaṃ cintayiṃ tadā..
[22] saphalaṃ nūna taṃ kammaṃ, janakāyo pamodito'..
[21] ``tattha me sukataṃ byamhaṃ, ubbhayojanamuggataṃ {uddhaṃ yojanamuggataṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)}.
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ ekūposathikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ saḷalapupphikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] mama bhāgaṃ gahetvāna, gacchaṃ udakahārikā {udakahārikaṃ (sī0), udakahārike (syā0)}..
[21] ``sampatti taṃ {sampattiñca (syā0), sampattikaṃ (ka0)} karitvāna, sabbaṃ anubhaviṃ ahaṃ.
[22] modake tīṇi datvāna, pattāhaṃ acalaṃ padaṃ..
[21] ``svāgataṃ ^a^T2.0274^ea^ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ modakadāyikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] mātā ca me pitā ceva, kammantaṃ agamaṃsu te..
[22] mālutā ca na vāyanti, kālo cevettha mehiti {cettha upaṭṭhito (sī0), cevatthaṃ eti taṃ (pī0)}..
[22] bhoge me ūnatā natthi, ekāsanassidaṃ phalaṃ {ekāsanaphalaṃ idaṃ (sabbattha) evamuparipi}..
[22] aññe bhave na jānāmi, ekāsanassidaṃ phalaṃ..
[22] uccākulīnā {uccākulikā (syā0 pī0 ka0)} sabbattha, ekāsanassidaṃ phalaṃ..
[21] ``dhātiyo ^a^T2.0276^ea^ maṃ upaṭṭhanti, khujjā celāpikā {khelāpikā (sī0), celāvikā (pī0)} bahū.
[21] ``aññā nhāpenti bhojenti, aññā ramenti maṃ sadā.
[22] aññā gandhaṃ vilimpanti, ekāsanassidaṃ phalaṃ {aññā mameva nhāpenti, aññā bhojenti bhojanaṃ. aññā maṃ alaṅkaronti, aññā ramenti maṃ saddhā. (syā0)}..
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ ekāsanadāyikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] ārāmena ca ārāmaṃ {ārāmena vihārena (syā0 pī0)}, carāmi kusalatthikā..
[22] dassetu pāṭihīraṃ me, bodhi obhāsatu ayaṃ'..
[22] yāva udeti sūriyo, dīpā me pajjaluṃ tadā..
[22] uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, sabbaṃ passāmi cakkhunā..
[22] tattha āvaraṇaṃ natthi, rukkhesu pabbatesu vā..
[22] mātukucchigatā santī, akkhi me na nimīlati..
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ pañcadīpadāyikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] jahitvā kinnarīdehaṃ {mānasaṃ dehaṃ (sī0 pī0 ka0) sumedhāvaggepi}, tāvatiṃsamagacchahaṃ..
[21] ``svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ naḷamālikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] tahiṃ kate {tahiṃyeva (syā0)} pure ramme, vasī bhikkhunupassaye..
[22] mittā {sabbā (syā0 pī0)} bhikkhuniyo tāhi, upagantvāna gotamiṃ..
[22] paridevā ca suyyante, kimatthaṃ nūna gotamī'..
[21] ```yadi te rucitaṃ ayye, nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sivaṃ.
[21] ```mayaṃ ^a^V2.0200^ea^ sahāva nikkhantā, gharāpi ca bhavāpi ca.
[21] ``na jarā maccu vā yattha, appiyehi samāgamo.
[22] piyehi na viyogotthi, taṃ vajissaṃ {taṃ vajjiyaṃ (syā0)} asaṅkhataṃ..
[22] pabhāte viya tārāyo, na dissanti jinorasā..
[21] ``rathiyāya ^a^T2.0283^ea^ vajantiyo {vajantiṃ taṃ (sī0), vajanti taṃ (syā0), vajantānaṃ (pī0)}, disvā saddhā upāsikā.
[22] tayā na yuttā {yuttaṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)} nibbātuṃ, icchaṭṭā vilapiṃsu tā'..
[22] nirodho me sacchikato, maggo cāpi subhāvito..
[21] ```buddho ^a^V2.0201^ea^ tassa ca saddhammo, anūno yāva tiṭṭhati.
[22] nibbātuṃ tāva kālo me, mā maṃ socatha puttikā..
[22] sukhito sahito saṅgho, hatadabbā ca titthiyā..
[22] nanu sampati kālo me, nibbānatthāya puttikā..
[21] ```sace mayi dayā atthi, yadi catthi kataññutā.
[21] ```ahaṃ ^a^P2.0532^ea^ sugata te mātā, tvañca vīra pitā mama.
[22] saddhammasukhada {saddhammasukhado (sī0 syā0 pī0)} nātha, tayā jātāmhi gotama..
[22] anindito {ānandiyo (syā0), anindiyo (pī0)} dhammakāyo {dhammatanu (sī0 pī0 ka0)}, mama saṃvaddhito tayā..
[21] ```bandhanārakkhane mayhaṃ, aṇaṇo {anaṇo (sī0 syā0 pī0)} tvaṃ mahāmune.
[22] puttakāmā thiyo yācaṃ, labhanti tādisaṃ sutaṃ..
[22] aṇukaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā, taṃ sabbaṃ pūritaṃ mayā..
[22] pasārehi paṇāmaṃ te, karissaṃ puttauttame {puttapemasā (sī0 pī0), puttapemahaṃ (syā0)}..
[22] katvā dehaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ te, santiṃ gacchāmi nāyaka'..
[22] cakkaṅkite pādatale, tato sā sirasā pati..
[22] pacchime maraṇe mayhaṃ {saraṇaṃ mayhaṃ (syā0)}, na taṃ ikkhāmahaṃ puno..
[22] yadi ko catthi doso me, khamassu karuṇākara..
[22] tattha ce atthi doso me, taṃ khamassu narāsabha..
[22] tatra ce atthi dunnītaṃ, taṃ khamassu khamādhipa {khamādhiti (syā0), khamāpito (ka0)}..
[21] ```suddhe anūne mama bhikkhusaṅghe, lokā ito nissarituṃ khamante.
[22] padakkhiṇaṃ kacca nipacca pāde, ṭhitā mukhantaṃ samudikkhamānā..
[21] ```na ^a^M2.0211^ea^ tittipubbaṃ tava dassanena, cakkhuṃ na sotaṃ tava bhāsitena.
[22] cittaṃ mamaṃ kevalamekameva, pappuyya taṃ dhammarasena titti..
[22] ye te dakkhanti vadanaṃ, dhaññā te narapuṅgava..
[22] ye pāde paṇamissanti {paṇamāyanti (syā0)}, tepi dhaññā guṇandhara..
[22] ye te vākyāni suyyanti, tepi dhaññā naruttama..
[21] ``hā santiṃ {bhāsantī (syā0)} gotamī yāti, nūna buddhopi nibbutiṃ.
[22] tayā me saraṇaṃ putta, nibbānaṃ tamupāgataṃ..
[22] mā putta vimano hohi, saphalo te parissamo..
[22] tattha gacchāmahaṃ putta, gato yattha na dissate..
[22] `na hevaṃ vandiyā buddhā, yathā vandasi gotamī..
[22] kathaṃ avandiyā buddhā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito..
[22] tato so samanuññāsi, kālaṃ jānāhi gotamī..
[21] ```svāgataṃ vata me āsi...pe0... kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[22] yugante viya lokaṃ sā, jālāmālākulaṃ akā..
[22] anuppattā sakaṃ atthaṃ, pāde vandāmi cakkhuma'..
[22] saradādiccasadisaṃ, raṃsijālasamujjalaṃ {raṃsimālākulaṃ jinaṃ (sī0 syā0), raṃsijālākulaṃ jinaṃ (pī0)}..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] gotamī nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvikā..
[21] ``taṃ sutvāna pamoditvā {taṃ sutvāhaṃ pamuditā (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ.
[22] āyunāpi ca vaṇṇena, sukhena yasasāpi ca..
[22] sabbesaṃ tattha yo jeṭṭho, tassa jāyā ahosahaṃ..
[22] te disvāna ahaṃ tuṭṭhā, saha sabbāhi itthibhi {ñātibhi (sī0 syā0 pī0)}..
[21] ``pūgā hutvāva sabbāyo {katvā pañcasatakuṭī (sī0 syā0)}, catumāse upaṭṭhahuṃ {upaṭṭhiya (sī0 syā0 pī0)}.
[22] pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātā devadahe pure..
[21] ``mama ^a^M2.0216^ea^ puttobhinikkhamma {sa me putto... (syā0)}, buddho āsi vināyako.
[22] ye tadā pubbajātiyaṃ, amhākaṃ āsu sāmino..
[22] vāsitā tava puññehi, pattā no āsavakkhayaṃ..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[21] ```atthe ^a^M2.0217^ea^ dhamme ca nerutte, paṭibhāne {paṭibhāṇe (sī0 syā0)} ca vijjati.
[22] ñāṇaṃ amhaṃ mahāvīra, uppannaṃ tava santike..
[22] yassa dāni ca vo kālaṃ, maññathāti jinobravi..
[22] vanditvā āsanā tamhā, vuṭṭhāya agamiṃsu tā..
[22] anusaṃyāyī so {anusaṃsāvayī (syā0 ka0)} vīro, mātucchaṃ yāvakoṭṭhakaṃ..
[22] na puno amatākāraṃ, passissāmi mukhaṃ tava..
[21] ```na ca me vandanaṃ {vadanaṃ (ka0)} vīra, tava pāde sukomale.
[21] ``mā ^a^P2.0540^ea^ no saraṇade nāthe, vihāya gami nibbutiṃ.
[22] bhūmicālo mahā āsi, nabhasā vijjutā pati..
[22] tāyopi anupādānā, dīpacci viya {dīpasikhā viya (syā0)} nibbutā..
[21] ``tadā ^a^P2.0541^ea^ āmantayī satthā, ānandaṃ sutasāgaraṃ {sutisāgaraṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)}.
[22] sā gotamī gatā santiṃ, tārāva sūriyodaye..
[22] na yattha pañcanettopi, gatiṃ {gataṃ (sī0 pī0), tattha (syā0)} dakkhati nāyako..
[21] ```yassatthi sugate saddhā, yo ca piyo mahāmune.
[22] buddhamātussa {buddhamātari (sī0), buddhassa mātu (syā0)} sakkāraṃ, karotu sugatoraso'..
[22] majjhaṃ gatopi cādicco, na tāpesi sasī yathā..
[22] vāditehi ca naccehi, saṅgītīhi ca pūjayuṃ..
[22] pacchā sasāvako buddho, pūjatthaṃ yāti mātuyā..
[21] ``buddho ^a^T2.0299^ea^ buddhassa nibbāne {na buddho buddhanibbāne (syā0 pī0)}, nopaṭiyādi {nopadissati (sī0 pī0), sāriputtādi (syā0)} bhikkhavo.
[21] ```aho acchariyaṃ mayhaṃ {ānanda passa buddhassa (syā0)}, nibbutāyapi mātuyā.
[22] rattaññū bhikkhunīnaṃ sā, evaṃ dhāretha bhikkhavo..
[22] parisuddhaṃ ahu ñāṇaṃ, tasmā socaniyā na sā..
[22] paññāpetuṃ gati natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukhaṃ..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``taṃ sutvā muditā hutvā, puno tassa mahesino.
[22] kāraṃ katvāna taṃ ṭhānaṃ, paṇipacca paṇīdahiṃ..
[21] ``tato mama jino {maṃ sa jino (syā0)} āha, `sijjhataṃ paṇidhī tava.
[22] sasaṅghe me kataṃ kāraṃ, appameyyaphalaṃ tayā..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] medhāvinī sīlavatī {rūpavatī (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, vinītaparisāpi ca..
[22] sabbā sampattiyo mayhaṃ, sulabhā manaso piyā..
[21] ``yopi ^a^T2.0303^ea^ me bhavate bhattā, yattha yattha gatāyapi.
[22] vimāneti na maṃ koci, paṭipattibalena me..
[22] dhanañjānī sumedhā ca, ahampi ca tayo janā..
[21] ``saṅghārāmamadāsimha, dānasahāyikā pure {neke sahassike mune (syā0), dānaṃ sahassikaṃ mune (pī0)}.
[22] saṅghassa ca vihārampi {sasaṃghassa vihāraṃ hi (syā0 pī0)}, uddissa kārikā {dāyikā (pī0)} mayaṃ..
[22] yasasā aggataṃ pattā, manussesu tatheva ca..
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo..
[21] ``anujāni ^a^V2.0215^ea^ ^a^P2.0546^ea^ na no tāto, agāreva tadā mayaṃ.
[22] dhammā ceva sudhammā ca, sattamī saṅghadāyikā..
[22] rañño maddassa dhītāmhi, manāpā dayitā piyā..
[21] ``saha me jātamattamhi, khemaṃ tamhi pure ahu.
[22] tato khemāti nāmaṃ me, guṇato upapajjatha..
[21] ``yadāhaṃ yobbanaṃ pattā, rūpalāvaññabhūsitā {rūpavaṇṇavibhūsitā (syā0), rūpavantā vibhūsitā (pī0), rūpavilāsabhūsitā (ka0)}.
[22] tadā adāsi maṃ tāto, bimbisārassa rājino..
[22] na tena nandanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, iti maññāmase mayaṃ..
[22] rammaṃ veḷuvanaṃ disvā, na tappanti suvimhitā..
[22] ko vattā tassa nissesaṃ, vanassa guṇasañcayaṃ..
[21] ``mahatā parivārena, tadā ca so {tadā maṃ so (syā0 pī0)} mahīpati.
[22] maṃ pesesi {saṃpesesi (syā0), sampāpesi (pī0)} tamuyyānaṃ, dassanāya samussukaṃ..
